extendedInfo.description: A mobile app specific for Emporia State University students, faculty, & staff. Included are features which will allow users to receive the latest ESU news, view the ESU faculty and staff directory, view Emporia and ESU maps. Additionally, for enrolled ESU students, the app includes capabilities which allow students to search course offerings, view their class schedule, check on their student account balances, and even view their grades, all through a secure login.

reviews.title: This is great!
reviews.comment: I love this app. It\'s nice to have your schedule, grades, and a campus map all in one place. It would be nice if we didn\'t have to log in every time we opened it, have it keep us logged in.
reviews.author: Emmaretta Evans

reviews.title: It\'s an awesome start!
reviews.comment: I was happy to see that we have an app, and I love all the stuff we can do on it. Grades are easy to look up and the maps are great. Everything comedy up really quick too, and nothing is hard to navigate. Definitely a good download
reviews.author: Mickey Reynolds

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app easy to navigate and has a ton of useful features.
reviews.author: Austin Hogan

reviews.title: Nice App
reviews.comment: Finally! This is awesome! Can\'t wait for more stuff to be added!
reviews.author: Jessica Roths

reviews.title: Like where we are going
reviews.comment: This app is really useful especially as an early version. As new features become available, it can only become more useful
reviews.author: Dylan Jacob

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: So nice to have for the \"on the go\" student! Can\'t wait for more features to be added! I Suggest adding Blackboard link here.
reviews.author: Brandy Baker

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: The app is a little sluggish, but the schedule feature alone makes it totally worth it. This is the app ESU deserves, even if it\'s not the app it needs right now.
reviews.author: Lexey St. Jost
